AgilisIT is an award-winning IT company that loves to help smart companies "SAVE money in IT, MAKE money with IT" • Best at:  Budget-friendly IT solution, health IT solutions, cloud infrastructure, business continuity, cyber security, data management & analytics, datacenter virtualization, Lean IT operations, strategy, optimization, workflow automation.• Specialize in ROI-focused IT solutions for startups to growth businesses, particularly those in healthcare, biotech and R&D.• An 8(a), WOSB. Provide IT solutions to military and civilian agencies through our Government Solutions Team.  • We are advisors and doers; architects and fire-fighters.  The single point of contact for successful businesses and those positioned for growth. • New technologies:  Public/Hybrid/Private Cloud solutions, web/mobile applications, IoTs etc.• We prefer to speak in plain English and not consultant mumbo-jumbo.We are thrilled to be recognized as the Winner of Healthcare Champions in Healthcare IT Award and the Women Who Mean Business Award in the same year.  We are honored because we've accelerated our clients' success, and our entire team is so proud of the hard work.

Partnerships With Industry (PWI) provides supported employment opportunities to adults with intellectual and/or developmental disabilities living in San Diego County.The purpose of the business development committee is to identify and evaluate new business ventures, so the nonprofit can generate additional revenue to complement its grant and donation-based revenue.

Athena San Diego supports the next generation of women leaders in science and technology through its annual Pinnacle Scholarships. Every year, five (5) merit-based scholarships are awarded to qualified graduating high school senior women in the San Diego County.  Previous winners have been admitted to Harvard, Stanford, Princeton, MIT and various leading colleges in the country.

Joyce is a great asset to San Diego’s Small Business Community.SCORE’s "From Dream to Reality - how to work with a mentor to start and grow your tech business" at Geek Girl Tech Conference was a success thanks to Joyce. I deeply appreciate Joyce’s contribution to the workshop by giving her perspective as a business owner. The workshop was engaging and inspirational because of Joyce’s effort into preparation and presentation. It’s wonderful when a busy entrepreneur takes time to give back to the community and inspire the next generation.

★ Dorothy Jones
Director of Human Resources at RealConnex - Connecting Real Estate Professionals to Capital, Investments, Services
January 19, 2015, Joyce was a client of ★ Dorothy’s

Joyce is the entrepreneur extraordinaire!  I have worked with her for over a year now as her HR Manager.  It's very rare these days to find CEOs of small companies who are just as concerned about the lives of their people as they are about being successful.  Joyce goes beyond the reasonable expectations for most senior management in treating her staff well, being fair and equitable, and at the end of the day, showing them she cares for them personally as well as professionally.  I've had many clients over the past 3-4 years, and I can truthfully say that Joyce and agilisIT rank right at the top of my "most favorite" list.  She always treats me like a peer, not as someone who works for her!  Kudos to Joyce!

summary: • Help businesses "Save Money in IT; Make Money with IT", turn IT into profit center.• Help Healthcare organizations manage data and improve patient health and financial outcome.• Help clients transform their traditional products into cloud products.  Design, build and provide 24/7 support and allow clients to focus on their innovations. • Support government agencies with cybersecurity, system integration, health IT and data analytics solutions.• Meet technology needs of businesses with customers/offices in Asia Pacific region.• Help business executives solve their business challenges with our industry veterans and results-driven, ROI-centric, Lean IT methodologies. • Advise businesses on smart cloud computing strategies; have honest conversation when cloud isn't the right choice.• Advise on datacenter virtualization strategies, risk and mitigation techniques, business continuity and disaster recovery planning.• Develop and implement Lean IT methodologies to streamline operations, increase productivity and lower outages.• Improve IT processes to increase operational efficiency• Identify IT talents to join our multidisciplinary team; provide challenging projects to our consultants while delivering exceptional results and value to clients. Certified in: Microsoft Certified Systems Engineer (MCSE) VMware CompTIA Security+ Project Risk ManagementJoyce was interviewed in these IT publications:http://www.cioupdate.com/trends/article.php/3885611/Unified-Communications-An-End-to-the-Hype.htmhttp://www.datacentres.com/news/cincinnati-bell-banking-big-growth-data-centreshttp://www.processor.com/editorial/article.asp?article=articles%2Fp3302%2F12p02%2F12p02.asphttp://www.smallbusinesscomputing.com/buyersguide/article.php/3939246/How-to-Find-a-Small-Business-VAR.htmhttp://searchsmbstorage.techtarget.com/news/1375256/Server-virtualization-pushing-SMBs-towards-SANs-iSCSI-based-SANs-help-them-stay-afloathttp://agilisit.com/in-the-news/
